Brendan will look to be very successful again and want to make an impact in the Champions League.

entry.title: Aidan Smith: No 10 has “wine-time Fridays” but will football ever get its “beer-time Saturdays” back?
entry.summary: As Hibernian were preparing to unveil the new slogan on the front of the shirts, I’m imagining there might have been some nervous excitement down Easter Road way. The sponsorship deal would be “the biggest of its kind” for the club, but, er, what about that name?
